SELECT max(id) AS value from tb_kinds
insert into tb_kinds ( nid, parent_id, inst_id, inst_code, user_id, code, parent_code, pre_code, name, spell_name, spell_first_name, level, sport_url, sport_real_url, create_date, update_date, ord, status, remark, data_1, data_2, data_3, zone_code ) values ( #{nid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{instId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{instCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spellName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spellFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sportUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sportRealUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ord,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{data2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update: update tb_kinds set nid = #{nid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, inst_id = #{instId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, inst_code = #{instCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_code = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_code = #{preCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spell_name = #{spellName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spell_first_name = #{spellFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sport_url = #{sportUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sport_real_url = #{sportRealUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ord = #{ord,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_1 = #{data1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, data_2 = #{data2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_3 = #{data3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zone_code = #{zoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id}
